summary: Integration tests for RST_STREAM retry behavior are failing on Windows with Node v22.12.0+. The issue is related to a Node.js regression and was fixed by disabling affected tests on Windows for affected Node versions.
userImpact: CI tests fail on Windows with Node 22.12.0+, preventing reliable testing and blocking releases on that platform/version combination.
rootCause: Node.js regression introduced in v22.12.0 affecting RST_STREAM handling, related to https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/56137
proposedFix: Disable the two RST_STREAM retry tests on Windows for Node versions 22.12.x through 22.14.x
workaround: Use Node v22.11.0 instead of 22.12.0 or later
resolutionDetails: Fixed by PR #1586 which disabled the failing tests on Windows for affected Node versions
keyQuote: Integration tests `Retry on "RST_STREAM with code 0"` and `Retry on "RST_STREAM with code 2"` have started failing on Windows since Node v22.12.0
